nodeList.loreText: Fierce and lethal, with a penchant for the weak.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal scorpion that poisons your enemies. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The scorpion counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
